document.full_text: bob baffert's derby horse midnight interlude bit the trainer phillip thomas twice on the arm. in the world of racetrack superstitions, baffert views this as a very good sign.
document.title: the rail: a healer's horse repays the favor
lines_and_colors: bob baffert's derby horse midnight interlude bit the trainer phillip thomas twice on the arm. in the world of racetrack superstitions, baffert views this as a very good sign.
